dict.acceptation: 解除；缓解；换班；（去厕所的一种委婉说法）方便；

sent.orig: I mean it will only relieve your pain.
sent.trans: 我的意思是这药只会减轻你的痛苦。

sent.orig: I was doing Yoga exercises to relieve my work-related stress.
sent.trans: 我刚才正在练习瑜枷，缓解工作压力。

sent.orig: It did not take the thieves long to relieve the passengers of all their money.
sent.trans: 小偷们没用多长时间就把乘客们的钱偷了个精光。

sent.orig: The engine is letting off steam to relieve the pressure in the boiler.
sent.trans: 机车在放蒸汽，以减少锅炉的气压。

sent.orig: The state must help relieve the students'financial burdens.
sent.trans: 国家要为贫困生排难解忧。
